publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-501 Karen Gillon: Colin McRae—That the Parliament expresses its regret at the untimely deaths of Colin McRae, Johnnie McRae, Ben Porcelli and Graeme Duncan in a helicopter crash on Saturday 15 September 2007; recognises in particular the sporting talent of Colin McRae, resulting in him winning the World Rally Championship in 1995; acknowledges his role in promoting Scotland abroad, and joins with many across the world in sending condolences to the three families affected.

S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Roseanna Cunningham*, Brian Adam*, Nanette Milne*, John Wilson*, George Foulkes*, Alasdair Allan*, James Kelly*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Butler*, John Lamont*, Rhoda Grant*, David Stewart*, Peter Peacock*, Trish Godman*, Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Murdo Fraser*, Jackson Carlaw*, Alex Neil*, David Whitton*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Lewis Macdonald*, Bob Doris*, Claire Baker*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Bashir Ahmad*, Liam McArthur*, Bill Wilson*, Nigel Don*, Des McNulty*, Kenneth Gibson*, Derek Brownlee*, Elaine Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Cathie Craigie*, Bill Aitken*, Tavish Scott*, Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*, Christina McKelvie*, Jim Hume*

S3M-501 Karen Gillon: Colin McRae—That the Parliament expresses its regret at the untimely deaths of Colin McRae, Johnnie McRae, Ben Porcelli and Graeme Duncan in a helicopter crash on Saturday 15 September 2007; recognises in particular the sporting talent of Colin McRae, resulting in him winning the World Rally Championship in 1995; acknowledges his role in promoting Scotland abroad, and joins with many across the world in sending condolences to the three families affected. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Brian Adam, Nanette Milne, John Wilson, George Foulkes, Alasdair Allan, James Kelly, Stuart McMillan, Bill Butler, John Lamont, Rhoda Grant, David Stewart, Peter Peacock, Trish Godman, Elaine Murray, Mike Pringle, Murdo Fraser, Jackson Carlaw, Alex Neil, David Whitton, Sandra White, Hugh O’Donnell, Lewis Macdonald, Bob Doris, Claire Baker, Pauline McNeill, Mary Mulligan, Bashir Ahmad, Liam McArthur, Bill Wilson, Nigel Don, Des McNulty, Kenneth Gibson, Derek Brownlee, Elaine Smith, Bill Kidd, Cathie Craigie, Bill Aitken, Tavish Scott, Mary Scanlon, Christine Grahame, Christina McKelvie, Jim Hume, Gavin Brown*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jackie Baillie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Angela Constance*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Margaret Mitchell*, Rhona Brankin*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Ken Macintosh*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Irene Oldfather*
S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Tom McCabe*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-501 Colin McRae (lodged on 19 September 2007) Michael McMahon*
